info.title: Watchman Payment Systems Bursar Billing REST API

get.summary: Retrieve account category by account ID and UUID

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Header account ID to retrieve account for

parameters.name: accountUuid
parameters.description: Account UUID to retrieve

parameters.name: categoryCode
parameters.description: Category code retrieve

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to retrieve account category for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Header account ID to save

parameters.name: accountUuid
parameters.description: Account UUID to retrieve

parameters.name: categoryCode
parameters.description: Category code retrieve

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to save account category for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

get.summary: Retrieves customer opt-in and enrolled flag values.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUUID
parameters.description: UUID of client

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. First page is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size to retrieve. Default 100. Will error over 2000.

parameters.name: termCode
parameters.description: Term to retrieve customers for.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to retrieve one customer at a time.

get.summary: Checks for new entries in the necessary tmp tables and creates the necessary EA charges in the FA table to be processed.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client uuid for the specific client to be processed. Default is all clients that have entries in the tmp tables.

parameters.name: termCode
parameters.description: TermCode for the specific term to check and create charges for. Default is all active EA terms for the client.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUUID
parameters.description: UUID of client

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of customer opt-in flag updates

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUUID
parameters.description: UUID of client

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of customer enrolled flag updates

get.summary: Retrieve an auth token for an apikey and an api secret.
get.description: The retrieved token will only be usable for an undefined limited time. If you later get a 401 when using the token, then use this endpoint again to retrieve another token

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: Api key secret your were given when the key was generated.

409.description: Key Disabled - see message - generate a new ApiKey or contact support.

get.summary: Creates transaction file for the passed dates. Drops the created file to the configured location.
get.description: The default search dates are from the beginning of the previous day to the end of the previous day. Expected date format: YYYY-mm-dd

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to create the file for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Starting date to use. Overrides the default starting date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Ending date to use. We will use the end of day time for this date. Overrides the default ending date.

get.summary: Creates transaction file for the passed dates. Drops the created file to the configured location.
get.description: The default search dates are from the beginning of the previous day to the end of the previous day. Expected date format: YYYY-mm-dd

parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUuid

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Starting date to use. Overrides the default starting date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Ending date to use. We will use the end of day time for this date. Overrides the default ending date.

get.summary: Creates transaction file for the passed dates. Drops the created file to the configured location.
get.description: The default search dates are from the beginning of the previous day to the end of the previous day. Expected date format: YYYY-mm-dd

parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

get.summary: Creates transaction file for the passed dates. Drops the created file to the configured location.
get.description: The default search dates are from the beginning of the previous day to the end of the previous day. Expected date format: YYYY-mm-dd

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to create the file for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Starting date to use. Overrides the default starting date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Ending date to use. We will use the end of day time for this date. Overrides the default ending date.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: Enum value for what type of file to generate. Possible options: IA_ONLY_DAT, STUDENT_BURSAR_DAT_DOES_NOT_INCLUDE_IA, NON_BURSAR_STUDENT, DEPARTMENT. Must not be null.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source for this call. Used to get client properties.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Ending date to use. We will use the end of day time for this date. Overrides the default ending date.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: Enum value for what type of file to generate. Possible options: IA_ONLY_DAT, STUDENT_BURSAR_DAT_DOES_NOT_INCLUDE_IA, NON_BURSAR_STUDENT, DEPARTMENT. Must not be null.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source for this call. Used to get client properties.

get.summary: Retrieve a FundTermConfiguration.
get.description: The given FundTermConfiguration will be retrieved.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: fundUuid
parameters.description: UUID of the Fund to retrieve for.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source to retrieve for. Leave off for sourceless.

parameters.name: termCode
parameters.description: Term code to retrieve for. Leave off for termless or yearly.

parameters.name: ftcUuid
parameters.description: The FundTermConfiguration uuid of the FundTermConfiguration to retrieve.

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to get FundTermConfiguration for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

put.description: The given FundTermConfiguration will be added/updated. We will match based on the UUID of the FundTermConfiguration.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: fundUuid
parameters.description: UUID of the Fund to retrieve for.

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to save FundTermConfiguration for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The FundTermConfiguration to add/update.

post.summary: Creates the necessary data to generate the IA Billing Reconciliation report.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to create the file for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

parameters.name: termCode
parameters.description: The code of the term to generate the report for. Defaults to the current term if not provided.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Starting date to use. Overrides the default starting date, which is the start date for the selected term.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Ending date to use. We will use the end of day time for this date. Overrides the default ending date, which is 30 days after the end date for the selected term.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source to retrieve the results for. If null, we will use all configured IA sources.

parameters.name: matchInvoice
parameters.description: Boolean value to match charges from the supplied input file only

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: IA file from client.

get.summary: Count active InternalAccount audits

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Customer accountId to retrieve for. Like match (must provide %).

parameters.name: iftUuid
parameters.description: InternalFundTerm UUID to retrieve for

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: WPS Request ID to retrieve for

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: WPS ApiKey to retrieve for

parameters.name: createdAtStart
parameters.description: Audit createdAt range start to retrieve for. Timestamp.

parameters.name: createdAtEnd
parameters.description: Audit createdAt range end to retrieve for. Timestamp.

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to retrieve InternalAccount audits for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

get.summary: Retrieve/count InternalAccount audits. At least one filter parameter is required. accountId required iftUuid to be specified as well.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Customer accountId to retrieve for. Like match (must provide %). Sorts no nulls.

parameters.name: iftUuid
parameters.description: InternalFundTerm UUID to retrieve for. Sorts no nulls.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: WPS Request ID to retrieve for. Sorts no nulls.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: WPS ApiKey to retrieve for. Sorts no nulls.

parameters.name: createdAtStart
parameters.description: Audit createdAt range start to retrieve for. Timestamp. Sorts no nulls (createdAt).

parameters.name: createdAtEnd
parameters.description: Audit createdAt range end to retrieve for. Timestamp. Sorts no nulls (createdAt).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Count option. 'true' to include a total count, 'false' to not. 'only' to just run the total count. Case insensitive.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort descriptor. List sort fields in order with + or - after each for ascending or descending, respectively, comma separated.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. First page is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size to retrieve. Default and max 30.

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to retrieve InternalAccount audits for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: InternalCustomer accountId

parameters.name: iftUuid
parameters.description: InternalFundTerm UUID

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to save InternalAccount for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

get.summary: DEPRECATED. Count active InternalAccounts

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key

get.summary: Retrieve/count active InternalAccounts

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Customer accountId to retrieve for. Like match (must provide %). Sorts no nulls.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: Customer firstName to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Customer lastName to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: Customer emailAddress to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: fundName
parameters.description: Fund accountName to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: termCode
parameters.description: Term code to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: iftUuid
parameters.description: InternalFundTerm UUID to retrieve for. Sorts no nulls.

parameters.name: startDateStart
parameters.description: Account startDate range start to retrieve for. Date only, supports ISO and US customary. Sorts asc nulls first, desc nulls last (startDate).

parameters.name: startDateEnd
parameters.description: Account startDate range end to retrieve for. Date only, supports ISO and US customary. Sorts asc nulls first, desc nulls last (startDate).

parameters.name: endDateStart
parameters.description: Account endDate range start to retrieve for. Date only, supports ISO and US customary. Sorts asc nulls last, desc nulls first (startDate).

parameters.name: endDateEnd
parameters.description: Account endDate range end to retrieve for. Date only, supports ISO and US customary. Sorts asc nulls last, desc nulls first (startDate).

parameters.name: capStart
parameters.description: Account cap range start to retrieve for. Sorts asc nulls last, desc nulls first (cap).

parameters.name: capEnd
parameters.description: Account cap range end to retrieve for. Sorts asc nulls last, desc nulls first (cap).

parameters.name: chargeCode
parameters.description: Account chargeCode to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: Account externalId to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: Account groupName to retrieve for. Like match. Sorts nulls first.

parameters.name: createdAtStart
parameters.description: Account createdAt range start to retrieve for. Timestamp. Sorts no nulls (createdAt).

parameters.name: createdAtEnd
parameters.description: Account createdAt range end to retrieve for. Timestamp. Sorts no nulls (createdAt).

parameters.name: updatedAtStart
parameters.description: Account updatedAt range start to retrieve for. Timestamp. Sorts asc nulls first, desc nulls last (updatedAt).

parameters.name: updatedAtEnd
parameters.description: Account updatedAt range end to retrieve for. Timestamp. Sorts asc nulls first, desc nulls last (updatedAt).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Count option. 'true' to include a total count, 'false' to not. 'only' to just run the total count. Case insensitive.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort descriptor. List sort fields in order with + or - after each for ascending or descending, respectively, comma separated.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. First page is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size to retrieve. Default 25. Will error over 25.

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: Client to retrieve InternalAccounts for. Defaults to ApiKey's Client.

put.description:

accountId required. On new InternalCustomer firstName, lastName, and emailAddress are used. Will NOT update existing customers.

parameters.description: api-key

get.summary: Retrieve active InternalFundTerms
get.description:
- If both Fund and Term are provided, return the single match (if it exists)
- If only Fund is provided, return all InternalFundTerms for the given Fund
- If only Term is provided, return all InternalFundTerms for the given Term
- Otherwise, return all InternalFundTerms that have no Term

post.summary: Gets all outstanding SIS payments to run and runs them asynchronously per fund.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: When set to true, we will only insert SIS transactions for test transactions

parameters.name: removeCreatedAt
parameters.description: When set to true, we will remove the default createdAt search param from the appropriate queries

get.summary: Gets all outstanding SIS payments to run and runs them asynchronously per fund. You can choose either to search by the pickedUpDate or the createdAtDate. You must select 1.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: pickedUpDate
parameters.description: Date to get transactions that are picked up after. ISO_8081 format

parameters.name: createdAtDate
parameters.description: Date to get transactions that are created after. ISO_8081 format

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: When set to true, we will only insert SIS transactions for test transactions

get.summary: Get the external transactions for the passed fund, date range and student(s)

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: fundUuid
parameters.description: The Fund.uuid of the Fund to use for retrieving transactions

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for retrieving transactions

parameters.name: apiKeyString
parameters.description: The ApiKey.apiKey for the key to look up transactions for. When null default is logged in key.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date to search for transactions. Default is now.

parameters.name: studentId
parameters.description: The studentIds to search for.

post.summary: Gets all submitSisCaptures that are successful posts and have not been audited and audits them.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: When set to true, we will only audit SIS transactions for test transactions

parameters.name: removeCreatedAt
parameters.description: When set to true, we will remove the default createdAt search param from the appropriate queries

post.summary: Gets all outstanding Net Suite Write Backs to run and runs them asynchronously per client.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: When set to true, we will only write transactions to NetSuite for test transactions

parameters.name: removeCreatedAt
parameters.description: When set to true, we will remove the default createdAt search param from the appropriate queries

parameters.name: cashSale
parameters.description: When set to true, we write a Cash Sale to NetSuite

parameters.name: clientUuid
parameters.description: The client uuids to run these for. If null, we run all of them.

get.summary: Gets all outstanding NetSuite Write Backs. You can choose either to search by the pickedUpDate or the createdAtDate. You must select 1.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: Token from {apikey}/token call

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: api-key

parameters.name: pickedUpDate
parameters.description: Date to get transactions that are picked up after. ISO_8081 format

parameters.name: createdAtDate
parameters.description: Date to get transactions that are created after. ISO_8081 format

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: When set to true, we will only insert SIS transactions for test transactions

accountId.description: The unique account ID for the header.

accountUuid.description: The unique UUID for the account.

uuid.description: The unique UUID for the account category.

categoryCode.description: The unique code for the bursar category for this account category.

priority.description: The priority for the account. Lower takes priority

cap.description: The spending cap for the category.

accountId.description: The unique account ID for the header.

name.description: The name of the account header.

mappedIds.description: Map from label to mapped account ID.

configuration.description: Map from label to mapper type.

entryNumber.description: The row number (spread sheet) or list index (JSON) of the entry with messages

uploadUuid.description: The UUID for the upload. Not present if the upload was immediately activated.

accountId.description: The unique account ID for the header.

accountName.description: The account name for the header.

uuid.description: The unique UUID for the account.

priority.description: The priority for the account. Lower takes priority

termCode.description: The term code for the account. NOT the mainPosTerm.

chargeCode.description: The charge code for the account.

externalId.description: The external ID for the account.

groupName.description: The group name for the account.

startDate.description: The start date for the account.

endDate.description: The end date for the account.

taxExempt.description: If the account is tax exempt.

cap.description: The spending cap for the account.

configuration.description: Map from label to supplier type.

termCode.description: The term code for the adoption.

crn.description: The CRN code for the adoption.

deptCode.description: The department code for the adoption. Required .

courseCode.description: The course code for the adoption. Required.

section.description: The section for the adoption. Required.

costToStore.description: The cost of the item charged to the store.

costToStudent.description: The cost of the item charged to the student. Required.

publisher.description: The item publisher for the adoption.

itemScanCode.description: The item ISBN for the adoption. Required.

itemName.description: The item title for the adoption. Required.

categories.description: The Bursar category codes for the adoption.

termCode.description: The term code for the enrollment.

deptCode.description: The department code for the enrollment.

courseCode.description: The course code for the enrollment.

academicCareer.description: The academic career for the enrollment.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the enrollment was created.

code.description: The unique code for the WPS category.

name.description: The name of the WPS category.

forceAdjustment.description: Is the category a forced adjustment category?

hidden.description: When set to true, the WpsCategory will not show as an available category in the UI categories.

customerId.description: The unique identifier for the customer

optIn.description: Whether the customer has opted in

customers.description: List of customers with opt-in and enrolled flags.

accountName.description: The account name of the fund.

uuid.description: The UUID of the case manager.

name.description: The name of the case manager.

organization.description: The organization for the case manager.

addr1.description: The street address for the case manager.

addr2.description: The street address for the case manager.

city.description: The city for the case manager.

state.description: The state for the case manager.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the case manager.

email.description: The email for the case manager.

managerTerms.description: The terms this case manager is linked to.

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice is due. ISO_8081 format.

invoiceNumber.description: The unique number for the invoice.

termCode.description: The code of the linked term.

CaseManagerTerm.description: Object for a case manager term.

firstName.description: The first name or names of the customer

lastName.description: The last name (usually surname) of the customer

address2.description: Second line of the address, if any

state.description: State or province abbreviation for this customer

country.description: Two character ISO country code for this customer. Defaults to US.

postal.description: Postal or ZIP code for this customer.

phone.description: Phone number for this customer. For best results in reporting, please use US format or international with all punctuation and spaces removed. (Digits only.)

id.description: POS or cart provider identifier for this customer - for auditing and reporting.

posId.description: POS or cart provider identifier for this customer - for auditing and reporting.

studentId.description: The unique identifier for the student

schoolName.description: The name of the school the student is or was enrolled in

enrollmentStatus.description: The enrollment status of the student

enrollmentDate.description: The timestamp indicating when the enrollment occurred

termCode.description: The term code to retrieve enrollment information for

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the student record was created.

uuid.description: The fund category UUID for the category.

categoryCode.description: The unique code for the WPS category for the category.

unlimitedToAvailable.description: True to make category unlimited (still under available).

ExternalFundCategory.description: Object for an external fund category.

chargeCode.description: The charge code for the fund.

externalId.description: The external ID for the fund.

forceChargeAllowed.description: If the fund allows force charge.

allowNegativeBalance.description: If the fund allows negative balance.

groupName.description: The group name for the fund.

taxExempt.description: If the fund is tax exempt.

guaranteedFunding.description: Amount of funding guaranteed by the Fund.

poRequired.description: If set, the Fund requires a PO number to auth charges.

notEligibleForIA.description: If set to true, the Fund is not eligible to be used for IA charges.

exclusive.description: If set to true and this Fund is used on a payment, no other Funds will be checked.

writesInternalToExternal.description: When set to true, the Fund will write charges to the SIS (if the Client is configured to write SAM charges to the SIS). This is not a necessary setting for ExternalFund's, only Internal. Default is false.

requiredDownPaymentPercentageAmount.description: The percentage (in decimal form) of the total charge that is required as a down payment.

downPaymentDoesNotAffectAvailableAmount.description: If set to true, the calculated requiredDownPayment amount will not affect the total available for the Fund. i.e. $10 cap on the Fund with a $1 requiredDownPayment. The full $10 is available.

cap.description: The fund level cap for transactions. This is only available for ExternalFunds.

linkedFundUuid.description: Linked Internal/ExternalFund UUID. This is only available for HybridFunds.

linkedFundIsLinkedToSelf.description: If true, the created HybridFund is linked to it's InternalFund. This would be set to true and the linkedFundUuid would be null for this setup.

canCreateInternalFundTerm.description: If set to true, the Fund can create an InternalFundTerm for the given term if one does not already exist. Only available for HybridFunds.

canCreateInternalAccount.description: If set to true, the Fund can create an InternalAccount for the given InternalFundTerm if one does not already exist. A linked ExternalFund is required for this. The customer in question must be active for the current term in the SIS to create the InternalAccount. Only available for HybridFunds.

requiredForReconciliations.description: If set to true, the Fund will be used for reconciliations. Only a required entry when there are multiple external funds for a client.

signatureRequired.description: If set to true, the Fund will set the signatureRequired field for the request. This is a read only field

specificallyAuthorizedUsers.description: List of authorized users for the fund

hideFromNonspecificallyAuthedUsers.description: If true, the fund is hidden from users who are not specifically authorized. Default is false.

last.description: If true, the fund will be the last fund checked if the passed account has an InternalAccount for the fund and term. This only applies to Internal or Hybrid Funds. Default is false.

miniumChargeAmount.description: The minimum total requested amount for charges to be authorized by the Fund. This only applies to charges.

categoryCode.description: The unique code for the WPS category for the category.

internalRep.description: The internal representation for the category in the external system.

priority.description: The priority for the category. Lower takes priority

uuid.description: The uuid of the dueDate mapping.

fundTermConfigurationCategoryMappingUuid.description: The uuid of the fundTermConfigurationCategoryMapping that we map the dueDateMapping to.

effectiveToDate.description: The effectiveToDate to use, leave null if not necessary.

plusDaysPastTodayForDueDate.description: The number of days to add to the current date if the due date is before today.

endOfNextMonth.description: The due date would be set to the end of the next month.

splitDueDateEarly.description: The splitDueDateEarly to use. This is used when split due dates are configured. This is the early date.

splitDueDateLate.description: The splitDueDateLate to use. This is used when split due dates are configured. This is the late date.

source.description: The source linked to the configuration. This needs to match the source on the payment ApiKey.

disabled.description: Determines if the FundTermConfiguration is disabled.

disabledAt.description: The time the process was disabled.

disabledBy.description: The identifier of the user that disabled the configuration.

disabledReason.description: The reason the fund term configuration was disabled.

fundTermConfigurationCategoryMappings.description: The category mappings for this Fund.

uuid.description: The uuid of the category mapping.

nonWpsCategory.description: The non WpsCategory that we map the configuration to.

useDescriptionAsPrefix.description: Whether to use the descriptions as a prefix. Use depends on Fund type.

useConfiguredDescription.description: Whether to use the configured descriptions. Use depends on Fund type.

secondaryCode.description: The secondary code. Used when there are more than 1 needed for charges or refunds.

secondaryDescription.description: The secondary description. Used when there are more than 1 needed for charges or refunds.

dueDateMappings.description: The dueDate to use, leave null if not necessary.

writesToPreviousTerm.description: Set to true if the configuration needs to write it's charges to the previous term.

customRef1Desc.description: The REF1_DESC description. This is to be used for custom REF1_DESC handling.

accountId.description: The unique account ID of the internal customer.

firstName.description: The first name of the internal customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the internal customer.

emailAddress.description: The email address of for the internal customer.

iftUuid.description: The UUID of the internal fund term.

termCode.description: The unique code for the term.

requestId.description: The WPS request ID that created the audit entry.

apiKey.description: The UUID of the ApiKey that created the audit.

apiKeyName.description: The name of the ApiKey that created the audit.

apiKeyEmail.description: The email fo the ApiKey that created the audit.

clientUuid.description: The UUID of the Client that has the ApiKey that created the audit.

clientName.description: The name of the Client that has the ApiKey that created the audit.

InternalAccountAudit.description: Object for an internal account audit.

accountId.description: The unique account ID of the internal customer.

firstName.description: The first name of the internal customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the internal customer.

emailAddress.description: The email address of for the internal customer.

iftUuid.description: The UUID of the internal fund term.

termCode.description: The unique code for the term.

startDateOverride.description: The start date override for the account.

endDateOverride.description: The end date override for the account.

capOverride.description: The cap override for the account.

chargeCodeOverride.description: The charge code override for the account.

externalIdOverride.description: The external ID override for the account.

groupNameOverride.description: The group name override for the account.

uuid.description: The fund category UUID for the category.

categoryCode.description: The unique code for the bursar category for the category.

capOverride.description: The override spending cap for the category.

unlimitedToTotalCap.description: True to make category unlimited (still under IFT/account cap).

accountId.description: The unique account ID for the customer.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the customer.

iftUuid.description: The UUID of the internal fund term.

termCode.description: The unique code for the term.

requestId.description: The WPS request ID that created the audit entry.

apiKey.description: The UUID of the ApiKey that created the audit.

apiKeyName.description: The name of the ApiKey that created the audit.

apiKeyEmail.description: The email fo the ApiKey that created the audit.

clientUuid.description: The UUID of the Client that has the ApiKey that created the audit.

clientName.description: The name of the Client that has the ApiKey that created the audit.

InternalFundTermAudit.description: Object for an internal fund term audit.

fundName.description: The parent's name for the fund.

termCode.description: The term code for the fund. NOT the mainPosTerm.

startDate.description: The start date for the fund.

endDate.description: The end date for the fund.

chargeCodeOverride.description: The charge code override for the fund.

externalIdOverride.description: The external ID override for the fund.

groupNameOverride.description: The group name override for the fund.

categories.description: The categories for the internal fund term.

InternalFundTerm.description: Object for an internal fund term.

uuid.description: The fund category UUID for the category.

categoryCode.description: The unique code for the WPS category for the category.

capOverride.description: The override spending cap for the category.

unlimitedToTotalCap.description: True to make category unlimited (still under IFT/account cap).

InternalFundTermCategory.description: Category for an internal fund term. On save, one of uuid or categoryCode need to be provided.

imported.description: List of constructor that were imported, ordered by last insertion.

clientUuid.description: The client uuid for the item.

scancode.description: The unique scancode for the item.

adoptionOnly.description: Is the item an adoption only item.

taxAmount.description: The tax amount for the item.

categories.description: The pos categories for the item.

requiredAuthList.description: The required list name. Is the name of the list of students that are able to purchase a item.

numSerializableAllowed.description: Number of allowed serializable items that can be purchased.

code.description: The unique code for the POS category.

name.description: The name of the POS category.

bursarCode.description: The code for the bursar category this maps to.

code.description: The unique code for the term.

mainPosTerm.description: Code used by point of sale.

termType.description: The type of term this is.

endDate.description: The last day of the term

previousTermCode.description: The code of the previous term

externalFundEndDate.description: The last day of the term to process External Fund charges from this provider.

postsUsingCurrentTerm.description: Set to true, if the term will always post to the current SIS term. Used for terms that do not link to specific terms like yearly or termless terms.

postToTermCode.description: The code of the term that this term will post their transactions to the SIS for. This would be used for terms that are not default terms, but need to write their charges to the SIS for a specific term. Examples for this would be UMaine's Graduate terms. These need to post to the same term as the graduate term, i.e. Graduate Spring term needs to post to the regular Spring term.

iaTerms.description: The IA details for the term.

eaTerms.description: The EA details for the term.

enrollmentProcessingStartDate.description: The first day of the term to process EA enrollment charges for this code.

enrollmentProcessingEndDate.description: The last day of the term to process EA enrollment charges for this code. If not set, Term.endDate is used (or no limit if neither is set).

processingEndDate.description: The last day of the term to process EA all EA charges for this code. If not set, (Term.endDate + 30 days) is used (or no limit if neither is set).

status.description: IA status. Can be left null.

startDate.description: The first day of the term to process IA charges from this provider. This field will NOT block charge processing; use status for that.

endDate.description: The last day of the term to process IA charges from this provider. If not set, Term.endDate + 30 days is used (or no limit if neither is set).

delete.description: True to delete record. False or null to save/update.

IaEaCustomerRecordMaterial.description: Object for IA/EA customer record material.
